description:
Black Jack and Pinoko fly to Asia to treat a 200-year-old man. Miriam, a relative of the man, wants to find the legendary phoenix which will grant everlasting life. The only thing is, 200-year-old man knows how to find the phoenix. Black Jack cures the old man, but the legend turns out to be a hoax. The man gained his long life from sheer will power, and the phoenix is really just a bird covered in luminescent bacteria.
Source: crunchyroll
